channel.title: The INFS2822 Podcast
channel.description: The official podcast for the UNSW course INFS2822: Programming for Data Analytics. New episodes every Friday during the teaching term.
channel.itunes:author: Blair Wang, UNSW Business School
channel.itunes:subtitle: The official podcast for the UNSW course INFS2822: Programming for Data Analytics. New episodes every Friday during the teaching term.

item.title: Week 4 - Laying Down Firm Foundations
item.description: This week involved kicking off Module 2 by deep-diving into JavaScript; adjusting the course according to the Module 1 exit survey; and preparing for the midterm. These are all about laying down firm foundations for weeks ahead.
item.itunes:author: Blair Wang
item.itunes:subtitle: This week involved kicking off Module 2 by deep-diving into JavaScript; adjusting the course according to the Module 1 exit survey; and preparing for the midterm. These are all about laying down firm foundations for weeks ahead.
item.itunes:title: Laying Down Firm Foundations
item.itunes:summary: This week involved kicking off Module 2 by deep-diving into JavaScript; adjusting the course according to the Module 1 exit survey; and preparing for the midterm. These are all about laying down firm foundations for weeks ahead.
item.content:encoded: This week involved kicking off Module 2 by deep-diving into JavaScript; adjusting the course according to the Module 1 exit survey; and preparing for the midterm. These are all about laying down firm foundations for weeks ahead.

item.title: Week 3 - The End of Module 1
item.description: This week, we finished off Module 1 with some technical concepts, but more importantly, a look at the big picture: communication, diversity, and what it means to program "for" data analytics.
item.itunes:author: Blair Wang
item.itunes:subtitle: This week, we finished off Module 1 with some technical concepts, but more importantly, a look at the big picture: communication, diversity, and what it means to program "for" data analytics.

item.title: Week 2 - Adapt, Improvise, Overcome
item.description: This week, we deep-dived into the Python language. Much of what we learnt could be summarised with that old saying/meme: Adapt, Improvise, Overcome.
item.itunes:author: Blair Wang
item.itunes:subtitle: This week, we deep-dived into the Python language. Much of what we learnt could be summarised with that old saying/meme: Adapt, Improvise, Overcome.

item.title: Week 1 - Let's Help Each Other
item.description: You made it to the end of Week 1! Let's recap and reflect on how we can help each other (#allinthistogether).
item.itunes:author: Blair Wang
item.itunes:subtitle: You made it to the end of Week 1! Let's recap and reflect on how we can help each other (#allinthistogether).

item.title: Week 0 - Introduction to the INFS2822 Podcast
item.description: In this episode, we introduce the INFS2822 podcast and provide some tips about how you can get ahead before Term starts.
item.itunes:author: Blair Wang
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode, we introduce the INFS2822 podcast and provide some tips about how you can get ahead before Term starts.
